title: Grand Canyon National Park: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Learn how to use Grand Canyon as a teaching tool in your classroom by participating in a teacher workshop in the park. All Teacher Workshops     Teacher-Ranger-Teachers At this time Grand Canyon National Park is not offering a Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program. When the program is active, teachers work as a park ranger during the summer, then bring their experience back to their classroom. All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers
